Property Description

Key features

  • MODERN FAMILY HOME
  • UPVC DOUBLE GLAZING / GAS CENTRAL HEATING
  • GARAGE
  • ENCLOSED REAR GARDEN
  • GROUND FLOOR WC / FAMILY BATHROOM / EN-SUITE SHOWER ROOM
  • IDEAL INVESTMENT / LOW MAINTENANCE HOME

Full description

Modern three bedroom semi detached family home with enclosed rear garden and single garage. The accommodation comprises in brief; entrance hall, lounge, kitchen/diner, ground floor WC, three first floor bedrooms (master with en-suite shower room) and family bathroom. UPVC double glazing, gas central heating. Providing excellent access for local schools and easy access to M5 motorway. Energy Rating: C-72


Entrance Hallway 
7' 5'' x 5' 0'' (2.26m x 1.52m)
doors to lounge, kitchen and WC, stairs to first floor

Lounge 
18' 5'' x 16' 9'' (5.61m x 5.10m)
understairs storage cupboard, French doors to garden

Kitchen/Diner 
12' 1'' x 9' 9'' (3.68m x 2.97m)
fitted in a contemporary range of units, built-in cooker and hob, boiler

Cloakroom 
6' 3'' x 4' 3'' (1.90m x 1.29m)
equipped in a two piece suite comprising of WC and wash hand basin

First Floor Landing 

Bedroom 1 
11' 4'' x 10' 5'' (3.45m x 3.17m)
dual aspect windows, door to;

En-Suite Shower Room 
6' 7'' x 6' 3'' (2.01m x 1.90m)
equipped with a WC, shower cubicle and wash hand basin

Bedroom 2 
11' 4'' x 10' 4'' (3.45m x 3.15m)

Bedroom 3 
8' 8'' x 7' 2'' (2.64m x 2.18m)

Family Bathroom 
6' 1'' x 5' 7'' (1.85m x 1.70m)
equipped with a white three piece suite comprising, WC, bath and wash hand basin

Outside 
The rear garden measures approximately - 30' 4'' x 24' 7'' (9.24m x 7.49m) laid to lawn with patio area. Summerhouse.

Garage 
18' 3'' x 8' 4'' (5.56m x 2.54m)
door to rear garden.
